HomePage.Hero1Subtitle: As one of the leading business hubs in the region we set an example for best practice in trade, design and service. We are a diversified group of companies with eight independent business units with our corporate office in Dubai.
HomePage.Hero2Subtitle:
Designing and installing Pumping Systems
Our engineering division has been designing and installing pumping systems since 1935.

Process.Heading: Our Process
Process.Step1Description: We begin by listening carefully to our customers and stakeholders, identifying their unique requirements and challenges. This ensures every solution is tailored to deliver maximum impact.
Process.Step2Description: Our experts craft innovative, eco-friendly, and cost-effective solutions that balance performance with environmental responsibility. Sustainability is embedded in every stage of our process.
Process.Step3Description: From planning to execution, we apply advanced technologies and industry best practices to deliver reliable, high-quality outcomes. Precision and efficiency guide every project we undertake.
Process.Step4Description: We don't stop at delivery. Ongoing monitoring, feedback, and support help us refine our solutions, ensuring long-term value and exceeding stakeholder expectations.

Partners.Heading: Our Partners
Partners.Description: We work only with the best to bring you only the best.

EnterpriseSections.Section1Subtitle: Deliver a triple play of results: happier customers, employees and shareholders
EnterpriseSections.Section2Subtitle: Accelerate your organization's results through your people and teams
EnterpriseSections.Section3Subtitle: Deliver a triple play of results: happier customers, employees and shareholders

BusinessSteps.Heading: To Get Successful Business, Follow These Steps
BusinessSteps.Step1Description: Drive growth responsibly by adopting eco-friendly practices that protect resources and support a cleaner future.
BusinessSteps.Step2Description: Drive growth through innovation, advanced technology, and smart diversification while adapting to evolving market demands.
BusinessSteps.Step3Description: Consistently deliver excellence to earn trust and build lasting relationships.
BusinessSteps.Text: Stay ahead in a rapidly changing world.

WhyUs.Heading: Why you should choose us?
WhyUs.Description: We combine innovation, sustainability, and trusted partnerships to deliver solutions that are efficient, reliable, and built for long-term value.
WhyUs.Item1Content: From water pumping to recycling, our products are designed to protect the environment while delivering unmatched performance and efficiency.
WhyUs.Item2Content: We collaborate with world-class brands like Grundfos to bring cutting-edge technology tailored to regional needs.
WhyUs.Item3Content: Our dedicated after-sales team ensures smooth installation, prompt maintenance, and long-term peace of mind - every step of the way.

AboutUsPage.Heading: About Us
AboutUsPage.Description: The M.A.H.Y. Khoory Group is one of the UAE's most trusted business groups, delivering world-class technological solutions across diverse industries. Headquartered in Dubai, the group employs over 3,100 professionals from 30 nationalities, operates 17 offices across the UAE, and serves clients in more than 29 countries across the Middle East, the Levant, and Africa.

MissionStatement.Heading: Mission Statement
MissionStatement.Text: To provide high-quality pumping products and engineered solutions through trusted partnerships, continuous innovation, and exceptional service, creating long-term value for our customers, stakeholders, and communities.

Purpose.Heading: Our Purpose
Purpose.Item1Text: To deliver innovative, sustainable solutions that create long-term value for our partners, communities, and the markets we serve. We are committed to combining expertise, technology, and responsible practices to address real-world challenges while driving measurable impact. Through continuous improvement and collaboration, we aim to build resilient businesses that contribute positively to economic and social development.
Purpose.Item2Text: To be a trusted regional leader, shaping the future through smart investments, innovation, and responsible growth. We envision a future where our initiatives set new benchmarks for excellence, adaptability, and sustainability across industries. By anticipating change and embracing progress, we strive to create lasting value for generations to come.
Purpose.Item3Text: Integrity, collaboration, and excellence guide everything we do, ensuring accountability, transparency, and lasting impact. We believe in building strong relationships based on trust, mutual respect, and shared goals. Our values drive ethical decision-making, foster teamwork, and inspire us to consistently deliver high-quality outcomes in all our endeavors.
Purpose.Text1: At M.A.H.Y. Khoory Group, our purpose is to deliver solutions that enrich lives while protecting the planet.
Purpose.Text2: We combine innovation, sustainability, and technology to create cost-effective products and services that empower communities, drive progress, and safeguard the environment for future generations.

History.Heading: Our History
History.Item1Description1: Founded in Dubai by Mohd. Abdulla Haji Yousuf Khoory
History.Item1Description2: Introduced modern engineering products during Dubai's formative years
History.Item1Description3: 1935: Pioneered water-pumping system design and installation
History.Item1Description4: Established global partnerships, notably with Grundfos
History.Item1Description5: Positioned as a leader in engineering & infrastructure
History.Item2Description1: Expanded engineering operations (Al Khoory Engineering / Senan Industry)
History.Item2Description2: Contributed to iconic UAE projects including Burj Khalifa
History.Item2Description3: Built Electrical Division representing Eaton, ABB, Lister Petter, Kirloskar
History.Item2Description4: Recognized regional leader in water & electrical solutions
History.Item3Description1: 1988: Launched Union Paper Mills - UAE's first paper-recycling plant
History.Item3Description3: Established Al Dhafra Paper Manufacturing (Abu Dhabi)
History.Item3Description4: Diversified into packaging, interiors, hospitality, logistics & waste management
History.Item3Description5: Transitioned into a multi-sector industrial group
History.Item4Description1: Launched Creative Solutions for energy & sustainability consulting
History.Item4Description2: Entered renewable energy as UAE partner for SolarEdge
History.Item4Description3: 2024: Re-entered automotive sector with Dongfeng Motor Corporation
History.Item4Description4: Focus on EVs, clean energy & innovation-driven growth

Industries.Heading: The list of industries we serve

OurPeople.Heading: Our People
OurPeople.Text: Our dedicated team of more than 100,000 employees from over 150 nationalities ensure the smooth flow of trade. As an equal employer that recognises and values diversity and an inclusive culture, we empower and up-skill our people with opportunities to perform at their best.

Leaders.Heading: From The Leaders
Leaders.Text1: Our people are our greatest strength and the driving force behind our shared vision of making trade flow.

Footer.Name: MAHY Khoory
Footer.Description: We are the M.A.H.Y. Khoory Group, one of the leaders in innovation and technology in the region and beyond. We are a conglomerate of diverse companies and business units, with a workforce of over 3100+ people.

Articles.Article1Heading: UAE Recycling Leader Union Paper Mills Drives Sustainability with Expanded Capacity Plans
Articles.Article1SubHeading:
Union Paper Mills announced strategic plans to significantly scale up production capacity to support UAE sustainability goals.
The expansion aims to bolster recycled paper output and strengthen circular economy contributions in the region.
Articles.Article1: In a major step for regional recycling and manufacturing, M.A.H.Y. Khoory's Union Paper Mills (UPM) announced plans to expand its production capacity substantially as part of the Group's sustainability roadmap. The initiative, aligned with UAE industrial strategy, will enhance UPM's ability to produce recycled Testliner and Fluting Medium products, serving both domestic and export markets while reinforcing environmental stewardship. UPM's use of advanced recycling technology ensures high-quality recycled output, contributing to waste reduction and supporting circular economy trends in the GCC business landscape.
Articles.Article2Heading: M.A.H.Y. Khoory Paper Division Showcases Innovations at ProPaper Dubai 2025 Expo
Articles.Article2SubHeading:
Union Paper Mills engaged industry leaders at the ProPaper Expo 2025 in Helsinki, highlighting UAE paper production excellence.
The company showcased its commitment to global networking and advanced recycled paper technologies.
Articles.Article2: Union Paper Mills, part of the M.A.H.Y. Khoory Group, participated at the prestigious ProPaper Expo in Helsinki, Finland, where it engaged with global paper and packaging industry stakeholders. The presence at this international event showcased the company's technological capabilities and its role in promoting sustainable and recycled paper solutions on the global stage. This initiative reflects UPM's proactive stance on innovation and industry collaboration beyond the UAE market.
Articles.Article3Heading: M.A.H.Y. Khoory Group Strengthens UAE Waste Management with Green Arabia Initiatives
Articles.Article3SubHeading:
M.A.H.Y. Khoory's recycling and waste management division launched programs to promote recycling awareness and services.
These initiatives support broader national environmental objectives and community engagement.
Articles.Article3: M.A.H.Y. Khoory's waste management division — including Green Arabia and allied units — has rolled out enhanced recycling solutions targeting efficient waste collection and processing across the UAE. These programs help businesses and communities reduce landfill contributions and improve recycling rates, aligning with national environmental sustainability goals. The Group's diversified approach to recycling — from paper to mixed waste — underpins its reputation as a socially responsible conglomerate committed to greener operations and public engagement.
Articles.Article4Heading: M.A.H.Y. Khoory's Pearl Marina Hotel Apartments Elevates Dubai Hospitality Experience
Articles.Article4SubHeading:
The Pearl Marina Hotel Apartments continued to offer premium accommodation services with enhanced guest amenities.
The hospitality unit's success underscores the company's diversification into lifestyle and tourism support sectors.
Articles.Article4: Located in the heart of Dubai Marina, Pearl Marina Hotel Apartments — an M.A.H.Y. Khoory hospitality business — has strengthened its reputation for quality accommodation and service. The property offers elegantly furnished units with modern amenities, catering to business and leisure guests alike. With concierge services, leisure facilities, and strong guest satisfaction, Pearl Marina exemplifies M.A.H.Y. Khoory's expansion into lifestyle services beyond industrial and manufacturing businesses, contributing to the UAE's tourism and hospitality sectors.
Articles.Article5Heading: Khoory Kitchens Showcases European-Style Interior Solutions Across the Middle East
Articles.Article5SubHeading:
Khoory Kitchens expanded its interior design offerings with partnerships showcasing European kitchen concepts.
The brand's interior design solutions enhanced residential and commercial projects region-wide.
Articles.Article5: M.A.H.Y. Khoory's Khoory Kitchens division leveraged partnerships with prominent European brands to bring a wider range of contemporary kitchen and wardrobe design solutions to clients across the Middle East. The expansion strengthened the company's position in the premium interiors market by combining functional design with high-end aesthetics tailored to local tastes. This initiative reflects the Group's commitment to broadening its portfolio in lifestyle and design sectors, catering to evolving consumer preferences in homes and businesses.
Articles.Article6Heading: M.A.H.Y. Khoory's Logistics Arm Expands Green Land Transport Services
Articles.Article6SubHeading:
The Group's logistics division Green Land Transport enhanced its fleet and service offerings.
This expansion supports seamless supply chain operations across UAE project and distribution segments.
Articles.Article6: Green Land Transport, the logistics unit under M.A.H.Y. Khoory & Co., strengthened its operations by enhancing its vehicle fleet and service reach. The expansion supports efficient project delivery and distribution across the UAE, reinforcing the Group's role in facilitating reliable logistics solutions connected to its diversified trading, manufacturing, and waste management businesses. This move underscores the company's strategy to integrate logistics excellence within its service ecosystem, fostering timely and dependable operations for clients.
Articles.Article7Heading: Union Wood Works Begins Production of Sustainable Compressed Wood Blocks
Articles.Article7SubHeading:
Union Wood Works introduced eco-friendly compressed wood block products to support construction and sustainable materials use.
This step broadens M.A.H.Y. Khoory's contribution to sustainable building supplies in the regional market.
Articles.Article7: Union Wood Works, a business unit under M.A.H.Y. Khoory & Co., began production of compressed wood blocks, offering an environmentally friendly alternative for construction and industrial use. The product aligns with increasing market demand for sustainable building materials and demonstrates the Group's versatile approach to environmentally conscious manufacturing. The innovation helps reduce dependency on traditional timber and promotes material recycling and reuse within various sectors.
Articles.Article8Heading: M.A.H.Y. Khoory Partners with Al Bahrawy Group as Official Service Provider for Key Project
Articles.Article8SubHeading:
M.A.H.Y. Khoory was selected as the official service provider for a major AED 600 million project with Al Bahrawy Group.
This acknowledgment reflects trust in Khoory's technical expertise in large-scale infrastructure projects.
Articles.Article8: In a strategic collaboration, M.A.H.Y. Khoory was appointed as the official service provider for a major AED 600 million development by Al Bahrawy Group. The partnership highlights Khoory's established capability in delivering engineering and services for high-value infrastructure projects, reinforcing its reputation for technical competence and reliability in the UAE's construction sector. This milestone deepens the company's footprint in supporting national development goals.
Articles.Article9Heading: National Paper Industry Strengthens Manufacturing with State-of-the-Art Facilities
Articles.Article9SubHeading:
National Paper Industry, part of M.A.H.Y. Khoory Group, continues to expand its manufacturing footprint with advanced machinery.
Its growth enhances the UAE's local supply of high-quality corrugated carton products for multiple sectors.
Articles.Article9: National Paper Industry, a subsidiary of M.A.H.Y. Khoory & Co., continues to reinforce its manufacturing capabilities with state-of-the-art production facilities and a skilled workforce. The company's focus on innovative manufacturing processes positions it as a key supplier of corrugated carton products within the UAE and beyond. By integrating advanced technology and optimized operations, National Paper Industry contributes to stronger local manufacturing capacity while complementing the Group's broader recycled paper initiatives.
Articles.Article10Heading: M.A.H.Y. Khoory Re-enters UAE Automotive Market Through Dongfeng Partnership
Articles.Article10SubHeading:
The UAE-based conglomerate returned to the automotive sector by partnering with Dongfeng Motor Corporation.
The move marked the launch of M.A.H.Y. Khoory's dedicated Automotive Division.
Articles.Article10:
M.A.H.Y. Khoory & Co. officially re-entered the UAE automotive market through a strategic partnership with China's state-owned Dongfeng Motor Corporation. Announced in 2024, the agreement positioned M.A.H.Y. Khoory as the exclusive distributor of Dongfeng passenger vehicles in the UAE, reviving the group's historical presence in the sector.
The partnership introduced multiple Dongfeng models tailored for regional demand, including sedans and SUVs equipped with advanced safety, connectivity, and efficiency features. Leveraging its deep market knowledge, M.A.H.Y. Khoory focused on building a strong sales, service, and customer experience ecosystem.
Company leadership described the initiative as a long-term investment aligned with the UAE's evolving mobility needs, reinforcing the group's reputation for bringing globally respected brands to the local market.
Articles.Article11Heading: M.A.H.Y. Khoory Launches UAE's First Dedicated Dongfeng Service Centre
Articles.Article11SubHeading:
A purpose-built service facility was opened in Dubai to support Dongfeng vehicle owners.
The center reinforced the group's focus on aftersales reliability and customer trust.
Articles.Article11:
Strengthening its automotive infrastructure, M.A.H.Y. Khoory Automotive opened the UAE's first dedicated Dongfeng service center in Al Quoz, Dubai. The large-scale facility was designed to handle high service volumes while maintaining premium service standards.
Equipped with advanced diagnostic tools, trained technicians, and an integrated spare parts department, the service center significantly enhanced Dongfeng's aftersales capabilities. Fast turnaround times and efficient logistics were central to the facility's design.
The launch demonstrated M.A.H.Y.Khoory's belief that long - term success in automotive retail depends on robust aftersales support, not just vehicle sales.
Articles.Article12Heading: M.A.H.Y. Khoory Appointed Distributor for OMODA and JAECOO in Abu Dhabi
Articles.Article12SubHeading:
The group expanded its automotive portfolio by securing distribution rights for two emerging brands.
The appointment strengthened its position in the electric and smart vehicle segment.
Articles.Article12:
M.A.H.Y. Khoory Automotive was appointed the official distributor for OMODA and JAECOO in Abu Dhabi and the Western Region, adding two fast-growing brands to its portfolio. The partnership focused on electric and intelligent vehicles designed for modern urban mobility.
Plans included the launch of dedicated showrooms and service centers to ensure a seamless ownership experience. The move aligned with the UAE's sustainability goals and growing EV adoption.
The appointment reflected international manufacturers' confidence in M.A.H.Y. Khoory's market expertise and infrastructure capabilities.
Articles.Article13Heading: M.A.H.Y. Khoory Signs 1,000-Vehicle Fleet Deal with One By One Car Rental
Articles.Article13SubHeading:
A major fleet supply agreement boosted Dongfeng's visibility across UAE roads.
The deal highlighted growing trust in the brand's reliability and value.
Articles.Article13:
M.A.H.Y. Khoory Automotive signed a landmark agreement to supply 1,000 Dongfeng vehicles to One By One Car Rental. The deal represented one of the largest fleet introductions for a new automotive brand in the UAE.
The partnership enabled rapid market penetration while offering rental customers access to modern, well-equipped vehicles. It also supported the UAE's expanding mobility and leasing sector.
Industry observers viewed the agreement as a strong endorsement of both Dongfeng's product quality and M.A.H.Y. Khoory's execution capabilities.
Articles.Article14Heading: Union Paper Mills Recognised at Middle East Recycling Awards
Articles.Article14SubHeading:
The M.A.H.Y. Khoory subsidiary earned regional recognition for recycling excellence.
The award highlighted leadership in sustainable paper manufacturing.
Articles.Article14:
Union Paper Mills, part of the M.A.H.Y. Khoory Group, was recognised as a top performer at the Middle East Waste & Recycling Awards. The accolade acknowledged the company's commitment to recycling innovation and environmental responsibility.
Using 100% recycled raw materials, Union Paper Mills has played a key role in diverting waste from landfills while supporting regional packaging demand.
The recognition reinforced the group's long-standing focus on sustainability and industrial excellence.
Articles.Article15Heading: M.A.H.Y. Khoory and Tetra Pak Partner to Recycle Beverage Cartons in UAE
Articles.Article15SubHeading:
A landmark agreement introduced the UAE's first dedicated carton recycling initiative.
The project advanced circular economy goals at a national level.
Articles.Article15:
Union Paper Mills and Tetra Pak signed a strategic agreement to establish the UAE's first beverage carton recycling line. The initiative aimed to create a closed-loop system for collecting and processing used cartons.
The partnership involved investment in specialized recycling technology and public awareness initiatives. It positioned M.A.H.Y. Khoory as a pioneer in expanding the country's recycling infrastructure.
The project directly supported the UAE's sustainability agenda and waste reduction targets.
Articles.Article16Heading: M.A.H.Y. Khoory Announces AED 1 billion Paper Mill Expansion in Abu Dhabi
Articles.Article16SubHeading:
A major investment doubled recycled paper production capacity in the UAE.
The expansion strengthened the country's industrial and export capabilities.
Articles.Article16:
M.A.H.Y. Khoory announced a AED 1 billion expansion of its Abu Dhabi-based paper manufacturing operations. The project significantly increased production capacity, making it one of the largest recycled paper facilities in the GCC.
The investment reflected strong confidence in regional demand and the UAE's industrial growth strategy. It also enhanced the group's ability to supply sustainable packaging materials.
The expansion reinforced M.A.H.Y. Khoory's role as a major contributor to the UAE's manufacturing sector.
